quote: Then the door flew open and Mr. Faulks told us to head over to the gym. I thought that was really smart. Get all of us in one place so the aliens didn't have to waste a lot of ammunition.
quote_letters: THEN THE DOOR FLEW OPEN AND MR FAULKS TOLD US TO HEAD OVER TO THE GYM I THOUGHT THAT WAS REALLY SMART GET ALL OF US IN ONE PLACE SO THE ALIENS DIDNT HAVE TO WASTE A LOT OF AMMUNITION
